panels.title: Sync Jobs (Last 24h)
panels.description: Total number of Sling sync jobs executed in the last 24 hours. Helps confirm job execution frequency and detect unexpected job halts.

targets.query: SELECT count(*) FROM traces WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time) AND span_name='sling.sync.run'

panels.title: Sync Status Breakdown
panels.description: Distribution of sync job outcomes (success, failure, noop, backfill). Quickly assess reliability and job mode usage.

targets.query: SELECT attributes.status, count(*) FROM traces WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time) AND span_name='sling.sync.run' GROUP BY attributes.status

panels.title: Sync Duration Trend
panels.description: Visualizes the runtime (in seconds) of each sync job over time. Detect performance regressions or unusual delays.

targets.query: SELECT start_time AS time, attributes.duration_seconds AS value, attributes.sync_job_id FROM traces WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time) AND span_name='sling.sync.run'

panels.title: Rows Synced Trend
panels.description: Shows how many rows each sync job processed. Helps validate expected data volume.

targets.query: SELECT start_time AS time, attributes.rows_synced AS value, attributes.sync_job_id FROM traces WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time) AND span_name='sling.sync.run'

panels.title: Recent Sync Logs
panels.description: Table view of recent Sling sync logs collected from OpenTelemetry logs. Click a row to jump to the related trace for deep analysis.

targets.query: SELECT timestamp AS time, severity_text, body, resource_attributes['sync_job_id'] AS sync_job_id FROM logs WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND resource_attributes['service.name'] = 'sling-sync-wrapper' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50

panels.title: Trace Explorer
panels.description: Jump to the trace explorer to view full execution details for sync jobs.

list.name: status
list.label: Sync Status
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT attributes.status FROM traces WHERE span_name='sling.sync.run'
